Shizune uses Tonton to hit the opponent, giving her enough time to use her two [[chakra]] [[swords]] to slash and kill the opponent. The slashes leave two big marks on the ground.

[[es:Espada de Chakra: Gran Herida de Intersección]]
[[pl:Chakura Ken: Daikōshō]]
